document_name: Final Project Report on Strengthening capacities of the Ministry of Finance of Montenegro.doc
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/MNE/00057369/Final Project Report on Strengthening capacities of the Ministry of Finance of Montenegro.doc

outputs.output_descr: The Project will focus on strengthening the Government's ability to efficiently plan, analyse and manage the public finances for the benefit of its citizens and in support to country's aspirations for sustainable development and EU integration. The outcome will include enhanced institutional and administrative capacity for financial analysis, management, policy development, dialogue and fiscal planning.

project_descr: Strengthening capacities of Ministry of Finance to efficiently plan analyze and manage the public finances in support to country's aspirations for sustainable development and EU integration
project_title: Strengthening capacities of Ministry of Finance
